verses.verse: Gather yourselves <S%H7197>together<s%>, <S%H7197>Yes<s%>, gather together, O <S%H1471>nation<s%> not <S%H3700>desired<s%>;

Before the <S%H2706>decree<s%> bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>, before the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> as the <S%H4671>chaff<s%>, <S%H3808>before<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H3117>you<s%>, before the day of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> come upon <S%H935>you<s%>.

<S%H1245>Seek<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all you <S%H6035>meek<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, which have <S%H6466>done<s%> his <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H6038>meekness<s%>: it may <S%H194>be<s%> you shall be <S%H5641>hid<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%>.

For <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> shall be <S%H5800>forsaken<s%>, and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>: they shall drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> at the noon <S%H6672>day<s%>, and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> shall be rooted <S%H6131>up<s%>.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast<s%>, the <S%H1471>nation<s%> of the <S%H3774>Cherethites<s%>! the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is against <S%H3667>you<s%>; O Canaan, the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, I will even <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3427>you<s%>, that there shall be no inhabitant.
And the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2256>coast<s%> shall be <S%H5116>dwellings<s%> and <S%H3741>cottages<s%> for <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>flocks<s%>.

And the <S%H2256>coast<s%> shall be for the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; they shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H1004>thereupon<s%>: in the houses of <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall they lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>, and turn away their <S%H7622>captivity<s%>.

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the <S%H1421>revilings<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, by which they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves against their <S%H1366>border<s%>.

Therefore as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Surely <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be as <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> as <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, even the <S%H4476>breeding<s%> of <S%H2738>nettles<s%>, and <S%H4379>saltpits<s%>, and a <S%H5704>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolation<s%>: the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H962>plunder<s%> <S%H3499>them<s%>, and the remnant of my <S%H1471>people<s%> shall possess <S%H5157>them<s%>.

This shall they have for their <S%H1347>pride<s%>, because they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> themselves against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H3372>terrible<s%> unto <S%H7329>them<s%>: for he will famish all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and men shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H376>him<s%>, every one from his <S%H4725>place<s%>, even all the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>.
You <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> <S%H1992>also<s%>, you shall be <S%H2491>slain<s%> by my <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And he will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, and <S%H6723>dry<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%H5739>flocks<s%> shall lie <S%H7257>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H2416>her<s%>, all the animals of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: both the <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and the <S%H7090>bittern<s%> shall <S%H3885>lodge<s%> in the upper <S%H3730>lintels<s%> of <S%H6963>it<s%>; their voice shall <S%H7891>sing<s%> in the <S%H2474>windows<s%>; <S%H2721>desolation<s%> shall be in the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%>: for he shall <S%H6168>uncover<s%> the cedar <S%H731>work<s%>.

This is the <S%H5947>rejoicing<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H983>carelessly<s%>, that <S%H559>said<s%> in her <S%H3824>heart<s%>, I <S%H657>am<s%>, and there is none beside <S%H8047>me<s%>: how is she become a desolation, a place for <S%H2416>animals<s%> to lie down <S%H4769>in<s%>! every one that passes <S%H5674>by<s%> her shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%>, and <S%H5128>wag<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
